thread.title: Here’s a Closer Look at Marc Newson’s Nike Air VaporMax Design
thread.title_full: Here’s a Closer Look at Marc Newson’s Nike Air VaporMax Design

author: Thomas Welch
title: Here’s a Closer Look at Marc Newson’s Nike Air VaporMax Design
text:
In further celebration of Air Max Day 2017 , Nike has tapped Riccardo Tisci , Arthur Huang and Marc Newson to implement their respective touches on a trio of Air Max models. After getting an initial peek at all three, here we showcase a closer look at Newson’s intriguing take on the Air VaporMax .
Recognized as the first high-top Air VaporMax offering, the sneaker boasts an overall eye-catching design, welcoming Nike’s ever-popular sock-inspired collar trend. On the upper, you will then notice forest green-colored Flyknit, paired with vegetable tanned leather on the Velcro straps and mudguard. Lastly, an icy bubble cushioned midsole draws attention to the bottom of the shoe.
You can look forward to the Marc Newson x NikeLab Air VaporMax ($275 USD) arriving at select retailers on Air Max Day 2017, March 26.
Following this exclusive look at Newson’s unique collaboration, be sure to investigate more of Nike’s Air Max day happenings here .
